content.question: Which of the following explains transduction?

choices.label: The process by which sensory stimuli are converted into neural signals
The degree of stimulation needed for a signal to be detected 50 percent of the time
The difference in signal strength needed for that difference to be detected
The process by which a person's eyes adapt to the dark

content.answer: The process by which sensory stimuli are converted into neural signals
